structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 317, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 8.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Capacity of juvenile to consent to treatment -- Petition to district court by minor hospitalized or treated involuntarily.
